nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member transectTransport is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the transectTransport analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_transectTransport_transect_group
nml_option.description: The name of the transect group that holds the transects for which the transport should be caclulated.
nml_option.possible_values: Either of '', 'all' or any valid transect group name.

package.name: transectTransportAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the transectTransport analysis member.

var.name: transectEdgeMasksMax
var.description: max of transectEdgeMasks for this processor.

var.name: transectVolumeTransportZ
var.description: Transport through transect of edges, with depth coordinate.
